summary: Choose one of four new effects for Konahrik; Force, Fire, Fade or Time.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]https://sites.google.com/site/konahrikaccoutrements/_/rsrc/1386932317694/images/KA_00title_warlord_256.png[/img] [youtube]fIKoceHX2Us[/youtube]

[i][b]W[/b]arlord. That is what Konahrik means in the dragon tongue. Many have scoffed at the
golden mask because its effects don't come into use until you are on the verge of defeat.
Most mods that alter the mask do so by making it overpowered or extremely generalized.
This mod, however, empowers Konahrik by adding choice. The idea is the same, the mask
can save you in your time of need, but now you can choose what your means of salvation
will be, depending on your strategy and character's abilities. This is Konahrik's privilege.[/i]

[img]https://sites.google.com/site/konahrikaccoutrements/_/rsrc/1386930029772/images/konah_ed_50px.png[/img]

[size=3]Depending on your choice, Konahrik can have one of four unique effects.

To receive the effects, meditate with Paarthurnax on either [i]Fus[/i] (force), [i]Yol[/i] (fire) or [i]Feim[/i] (fade)
- or -
pray at a Shrine of Akatosh to receive [i]Tiid[/i] (time).[/size] [/center]
[img]https://sites.google.com/site/konahrikaccoutrements/_/rsrc/1398056123951/konahrik-s-privilege/KP_01fus.png[/img]
[right]
[img]https://sites.google.com/site/konahrikaccoutrements/_/rsrc/1398056110409/konahrik-s-privilege/KP_02yol.png[/img][/right]

[img]https://sites.google.com/site/konahrikaccoutrements/_/rsrc/1398056139911/konahrik-s-privilege/KP_03feim.png[/img]
[right]
[img]https://sites.google.com/site/konahrikaccoutrements/_/rsrc/1398056153142/konahrik-s-privilege/Kp_04tiil.png[/img][/right]


[center] [size=3]The effect can be changed at any time, as long as Paarthurnax is still alive.

Note: Tiid takes precedence over the other effects if Akatosh's Blessing is active.
Note: Fus and Yol's tertiary effect can damage followers and friendly NPCs.[/size]


Available in other languages:
[url=http://tes.riotpixels.com/mods/skyrim/gameplay/readme/konahriks-accoutrements][img]http://i.imgur.com/ZDmlA.png[/img][/url] [/center]

Related Mods

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32458/?][img]https://sites.google.com/site/konahrikaccoutrements/_/rsrc/1386932683305/images/KA_00title_armory_256.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48777/?][img]https://sites.google.com/site/konahrikaccoutrements/_/rsrc/1386932722334/images/KA_00title_dpe_256.png[/img][/url]
author: Edhelsereg

files.name: Konahriks Privilege
files.changelogHtml:
All effects can proc' at a higher hp but now have cooldowns.

Fus
Primary Effect: Force Push - Available at 40% HP or lower
Secondary Effect: Grand Heal - Avaialbe at 20% HP or lower
Cooldown: 20 seconds

Feim
Primary Effect: Etherealize - Avaialble at 70% HP or lower
Secondary Effect: Conjure Dragon Priest - Available at 30% HP or lower
Cooldown: 20 seconds

Yol
Primary Effect: Flame Cloak - Avaialble at 85% HP or lower
Secondary Effect: Fire Storm - Available at 25% HP or lower
Tertiary Effect: Grand Heal - Available at 25% HP or lower
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Tiid
Primary Effect: Slow Time - Avaialble at 33% HP or lower
Secondary Effect: Flame Cloak - Available at 33% HP or lower
Tertiary Effect: Grand Heal - Available at 25% HP or lower
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Default
Primary Effect: Flame Cloak - Avaialble at 33% HP or lower
Secondary Effect: Fast Healing - Available at 33% HP or lower
Cooldown: 30 seconds
